revised_title: Investigation of the Earthquake of December 16, 1857, in the Kingdom of Naples: Seismic Vertical and Focal Cavity
tldr: The author, Robert Mallet, investigates the earthquake that occurred on December 16, 1857, in the Kingdom of Naples. He determines the seismic vertical, focal cavity depth, and the effects of physical configurations on the earthquake's progress. Mallet also discusses the sounds heard during the earthquake and its relation to the focal cavity's dimensions.
